submissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers need to submit their bids for the procedure.

SubmissionTerms.title: Submission terms
SubmissionTerms.description: Information about the submission terms to describe how, when and where the tenderers need to submit their bids.

electronicSubmissionPolicy.title: Electronic submission policy
electronicSubmissionPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids electronically.

variantPolicy.title: Variant policy
variantPolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids which fulfill the buyer's needs differently than as proposed in the procurement documents.

electronicCataloguePolicy.title: Electronic catalogue policy
electronicCataloguePolicy.description: Whether tenderers are required, allowed or not allowed to submit bids as electronic catalogues.

languages.title: Submission language
languages.description: One or more languages in which bids or requests to participate can be submitted, using either two-letter [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes), or extended [BCP47 language tags](http://www.w3.org/International/articles/language-tags/). The use of lowercase two-letter codes from [ISO639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes) is recommended.

bidValidityPeriod.title: Bid validity period
bidValidityPeriod.description: The period, from the bid submission deadline, for which bids must remain valid.

depositsGuarantees.title: Deposits and guarantees
depositsGuarantees.description: Information about the deposits or guarantees required from the tenderers.

advancedElectronicSignatureRequired.title: Advanced electronic signature required
advancedElectronicSignatureRequired.description: Whether an advanced or qualified electronic signature or seal (as defined in European Parliament and Council Regulation (EU) No 910/2014) is required.

multipleBidsAllowed.title: Multiple bids allowed
multipleBidsAllowed.description: Whether tenderers can submit more than one bid.

nonElectronicRationale.title: Non-electronic submission rationale
nonElectronicRationale.description: The rationale for electronic submission not being possible.

subcontractingClauses.title: Subcontracting clauses
subcontractingClauses.description: The information about subcontracting that must be indicated in the tender.
